name: OR_CASE_ANES_EQUIP
description: The OR_CASE_ANES_EQUIP table contains OR management system case anesthesia equipment.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the anesthesia equipment requested for this case.

columns.name: ANESTH_EQUIP_CMT
columns.description: A free-text comment about a piece of anesthesia equipment.
